# item(_:allowsAutomaticPitch:)

**Type Method**

Creates a new camera position centered on a map item and automatic pitch selection you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
static func item(_ item: MKMapItem, allowsAutomaticPitch: Bool = true) -> MapCameraPosition
```

## Parameters

- **item**: The [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapItem] to center the map on.
- **allowsAutomaticPitch**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the camera selects a pitch automatically.

## Return Value

Returns a new [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MapCameraPosition].

## Creating a camera position

- **camera(_:)**: Creates a new camera position from an existing map camera you provide.
- **rect(_:)**: Creates a new camera position with the map boundaries you provide.
- **region(_:)**: Creates a new camera position the coordinate region you provide.
- **userLocation(followsHeading:fallback:)**: Creates a camera position with the specific fallback position and optionally follows the user’s heading.
